title: Dog Grooming Services
metaTitle: Professional Dog Grooming Services in UAE | Homezy
metaDescription: Expert dog grooming in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and across UAE. Bathing, haircuts, nail trimming, and full grooming services. Mobile grooming available.
keywords: dog grooming, dog groomer, pet grooming, dog bath, dog haircut, nail trimming, mobile dog grooming, dog spa, UAE
description: Keep your furry friend looking and feeling great with our professional dog grooming services. Our experienced groomers provide everything from basic baths and nail trims to breed-specific haircuts and full spa treatments. We handle all breeds and sizes with gentle, patient care. Mobile grooming brings the salon to you.
whatToExpect: Your dog's grooming session begins with a thorough brush-out, followed by a warm bath with breed-appropriate shampoo. We clean ears, trim nails, and style fur according to breed standards or your preferences. The session ends with a final fluff and any finishing touches you request.

faqs.question: What grooming services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer full grooming (bath, haircut, nail trim, ear cleaning), bath and brush packages, nail trimming only, ear cleaning, teeth brushing, de-shedding treatments, and breed-specific styling.

faqs.question: How long does grooming take?
faqs.answer: A basic bath and brush takes 45-60 minutes. Full grooming with haircut takes 1.5-3 hours depending on breed, coat condition, and style. Large or matted dogs may take longer.

faqs.question: Do you groom all dog breeds?
faqs.answer: Yes, our groomers are trained to work with all breeds from Chihuahuas to Great Danes. We know breed-specific cuts and can also do custom styles you prefer.

faqs.question: What if my dog is nervous?
faqs.answer: Our groomers are experienced with anxious dogs. We use gentle handling, take breaks when needed, and create a calm environment. For very nervous dogs, we can schedule longer appointments to go slowly.

faqs.question: Do you offer mobile grooming?
faqs.answer: Yes, our mobile grooming service brings a fully-equipped grooming van to your home. This is ideal for busy owners, multiple pets, or dogs who get anxious during car rides.
